events.text: 5 minutes in and Kenedy cuts through the United defence like a knife through butter. Jones hacks him down, yellow card.
And its that man Kenedy again! Quick counter attack, Shelvey plays a delightful through ball, and Kenedy slots it through the keepers legs. 0-1.
And its two nil Newcastle. Corner in by Ritchie and Lascelles does the rest.
And another! This time its Muto getting in on the action. Another great ball by Shlevey finds Muto in acres of space, and he buries it into the roof of the net! 0-3.
Well that was a rather stupid foul. Pogba, yellow card.
Manchester United need to regain their composure now or this could get embarrassing.

Well that was fantastic. Kenedy takes the ball from his own box, rounds 8 United players, puts it through De Gea's legs gets on his hands and knees and heads it over the line. I've never seen anything like it!
And that's the 5th, and its another for Muto. Great cross by Ritchie, headered into the top corner. 0-5!
And its half time! What a half!
